assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: All procedures performed in studies involving human participants were in accordance with the 1964 Helsinki Declaration and its later amendments or comparable ethical standards. The study was approved by the Chinese University of Hong Kong (CREC Ref. No.: 2021.237).

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Informed consent was obtained from all individual participants and their parents included in the study.
